edge: Ajnabee is a 2001 Indian Hindi-language action thriller film directed by Abbas–Mustan and produced by Vijay Galani.

Raj and Priya Malhotra move to Switzerland, where they meet their Indian neighbors, Vikram and Sonia Bajaj. All of them quickly become friends and go on a Christmas vacation together to Mauritius.

Suggests Raj to try partner-swapping and asks him to enjoy with Sonia and Vicky simultaneously. Also, manages to send a drunk Raj into his house while he goes on to Raj's house to meet Priya.
Disgusted by Vicky's offer to enjoy with Priya, argues with him and becomes partially clothed woman in bed with Raj, realizing he was tricked and is in Vicky's house.
Thinks Vicky successfully convinced Priya to continue Wife-Swapping overnight by seducing.
Fulfills Raj's request when he came over as it was his birthday and didn't want him to feel disappointed on his birthday by refusing to give what he was asking from her.

Raj wakes up to find a partially clothed woman in bed with him and realizes he was tricked and is in Vicky's house. Priya confirms Vicky coming over as Raj had sent him over and states it should not be a regular occurrence but won't mind if it's on special occasions.
Found boarding pass belonging to Sonia with a destination of Geneva on the night she was supposedly murdered in Zurich. Suspected her as the woman Raj saw with Vikram in Mauritius.
Rumoured to have been romantically involved with Sonia based on witnesses' testimonies. Found fingerprints of Vikram on the murder weapon.
Accused by Vicky of coming up with the idea of wife-swapping, found by neighbours entering Vikram's house along with someone on the night Sonia was murdered.
Innocence claimed by Raj, who escaped from court and was chased by Swiss police. Accused of Sonia's murder due to fingerprints found on the murder weapon.

Believed in Raj's innocence and aided him in finding out what really happened. Escaped with Raj from the court and was found by neighbours entering Vikram's house along with someone on the night Sonia was murdered.
Accused by Vicky of continuing wife-swapping overnight and romancing each other with wild passion. Fingerprints not found on the murder weapon.
